      • createAndAnnounceTransaction

        public io.reactivex.Observable<java.lang.String> createAndAnnounceTransaction(ProximaxMessagePayloadModel messagePayload,
                                                                              java.lang.String signerPrivateKey,
                                                                              java.lang.String recipientPublicKey,
                                                                              java.lang.String recipientAddress,
                                                                              int transactionDeadline,
                                                                              java.util.List<io.proximax.sdk.model.mosaic.Mosaic> transactionMosaics,
                                                                              boolean useBlockchainSecureMessage)
        Create and announce a blockchain transaction
        Parameters:
        messagePayload - the message payload
        signerPrivateKey - the signer's private key for the transaction
        recipientPublicKey - the recipient's public key for the transaction (if different from signer)
        recipientAddress - the recipient's address for the transaction (if different from signer)
        transactionDeadline - the transaction deadline in hours
        transactionMosaics - the mosaics to use on upload transaction
        useBlockchainSecureMessage - the flag to indicate if secure message will be created
        Returns:
        the transaction hash
